name: Elegant Pretty Little Liars Tumblr Dashboard 1.0
description: A light, elegant Tumblr dash featuring our 4 favorite liars!
additional_info:
If you notice any problem, do not hesitate to contact me on here or Tumblr (webothknow-.tumblr.com)
